sections.title: Stargazer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Stargazer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Guiding Light (Su) (Stargazer)
sections.description: The stargazer gains a familiar, treating his stargazer level as his wizard level for familiar purposes.

sections.title: Mystery Magic (Ex) (Stargazer)
sections.description: The stargazer gains witch hexes at 1st and 9th levels, heavens spirit hexes, the Stars subdomain at 3rd level, and specific oracle revelations at 5th and 7th levels, with levels stacking across multiple classes.

sections.title: Sidereal Arcana (Su or Sp) (Stargazer)
sections.description: The stargazer gains constellation-based powers called sidereal arcana at 2nd level and every 2 levels thereafter, choosing from specific cosmic caravan constellations.

sections.title: Stars’ Dance (Ex) (Stargazer)
sections.description: Once per day at 10th level, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other sidereal arcana permanently.
